Hi Madeleine,

I hope all is well.

Sure, can you please try now?
https://littlescribblers.com.au/book-tour/

Hi Joel,

Thank you again for your support in resolving the routing issue yesterday.

Our ads agency has flagged that they're encountering a 404 error when attempting to access the Book a Tour page. They've suggested that this may be due to a caching issue and that purging the cache in the back end could help resolve it.

Would you be able to assist with clearing the cache to see if that fixes the error?

Thanks so much,
Madeleine Saville
Social Media & Marketing Content Coordinator
Little Scribblers Early Learning Centres

Hi Madeleine,

Awesome, the test is for Sutherland. sutherlandsupervisor@littlescribblers.com.au should receive the email.

Hi all,

Thank you so much for your help, ktodd@lineleader.com - really appreciate it!
And thank you Joel for jumping in to get this sorted.

I've just checked our LineLeader flow and noticed the test submission hasn't appeared, which suggests the issue may now be resolved. Could you please confirm which centre the test enquiry was directed to - was it Sutherland or one of the Peakhurst centres?

I'll follow up with the relevant teams to ensure the test flowed through correctly on their end.

Thanks again,
Madeleine Saville
Social Media & Marketing Content Coordinator
Little Scribblers Early Learning Centres

Thanks Kasey for looking into this.

Hi Madeleine,

We have made changes to the form and sent a test submission. Would you be able to confirm?

Hi Joel, The below locations should not be passing into Lineleader as they have different ownership.
  • Peakhurst - Belmore Road
  • Peakhurst - Bonds Road
  • Sutherland
These locations should be notifying the Little Scribblers team via email not coming into Lineleader. I would suggest removing those locations from the LineLeader Post URL and moving them to their own post URL to route them to the correct email. Kind Regards Kasey Todd Senior Customer Operations Advocate Phone | (07) 3185 5115 www.lineleader.com/en-au

Hi Kasey,

I hope you're doing well!

We're currently using a webhook to pass the data.

In case it helps, here’s the full list of locations we are passing:
  • Ashfield
  • Beaconsfield
  • Benaroon
  • Belmore
  • Brighton
  • Brookvale
  • Caringbah
  • Dingley
  • Mooroolbark
  • Peakhurst – Belmore Road
  • Peakhurst – Bonds Road
  • Sutherland

Please let us know if any adjustments to these values are needed.

Hi Team! Thanks so much for reaching out - it was lovely chatting with you, @Madeleine Saville! I just wanted to confirm that you're connecting the Enquiry Form to LineLeader using Zapier and custom webhooks. If so, it's possible that the Peakhurst and Sutherland locations were incorrectly mapped in the POST URL(https://live.childcarecrm.com.au/import/webImportReceiver.php), which might be why they're appearing in LineLeader when they shouldn't be, are you able to double check this? I have included the location import values below that should be coming into Lineleader; Submission Values:
  • Beaconsfield
  • Ashfield
  • Moorloorbark
  • Brookvale
  • Belmore
  • Caringbah
  • Dingley
  • Brighton
Kind Regards Kasey Todd Senior Customer Operations Advocate Phone | (07) 3185 5115 www.lineleader.com/en-au

Hi Joel

Thanks for jumping on this, looping in Kasey from LineLeader into this thread, ktodd@lineleader.com: are you able to look into Joel's email below and let us know?

Thanks so much
Madeleine Saville

Social Media & Marketing Content Coordinator
Little Scribblers Early Learning Centres

HEAD OFFICE - Centre of Excellence
106 Russell Avenue
Dolls Point NSW 2219

E: Madeleine.saville@littlescribblers.com.au
M: 0475 738 243
Web: www.littlescribblers.com.au

Hi Madeleine,

I hope you're doing well.

We are currently looking into this. We can confirm that the data is being passed to LineLeader, but it appears that LineLeader is not processing it. Could you please check with LineLeader to see if we need to set a specific value key for these three locations?

Hi Joel,

I just wanted to flag an issue we've noticed-several enquiries have recently come through to LineLeader without a location selected. After following up with the families, they've confirmed they had selected either Sutherland, Peakhurst 1, or Peakhurst 2 as their preferred centre.

I've just run a test myself and it appears there may be a glitch, as enquiries for these locations are not flowing through to LineLeader as expected.

These particular enquiries should trigger an email notification containing the parent's details and message, as these centres are not managed within LineLeader but are instead overseen by Silvia.

Could you please look into this and let me know what can be done to ensure enquiries for these locations are correctly routed?

For reference:


  • Send to bondsroadsupervisor@littlescribblers.com.au

  • for: Peakhurst - Bonds Road

  • Send to peakhurstsupervisor@littlescribblers.com.au

  • For: Peakhurst - Belmore Road

  • Send to sutherlandsupervisor@littlescribblers.com.au

  • for: Sutherland


Thanks so much,
Madeleine Saville
Social Media & Marketing Content Coordinator
Little Scribblers Early Learning Centres

HEAD OFFICE - Centre of Excellence
106 Russell Avenue
Dolls Point NSW 2219

E: Madeleine.saville@littlescribblers.com.au
M: 0475 738 243
Web: www.littlescribblers.com.au

Hi Joel

Thanks so much for the update. All is working perfectly on our end - thank you so much for reconnecting everything and getting it sorted!

Really appreciate your help.

Warm regards,
Madeleine Saville
Social Media & Marketing Content Coordinator
Little Scribblers Early Learning Centres

(Time: 30mins)

Hi Madeleine,

I hope all is well, Thanks for this.

We managed to backtrack and locate the code, which we've now added to the shortened form.

I've just tested the form—would you mind checking if it came through on your end?

Hi Joel,

Thanks again for your support on this.

I've gone through our previous CRM transition email threads with LineLeader and Wolf IQ and confirmed that the original form implementation used JavaScript rather than an iframe embed. This allowed us to pass form data directly via a custom-coded webhook to LineLeader for CRM-connected centres, while also configuring custom email notifications for centres not connected to LineLeader.
Zapier was suggested early on by LineLeader, but it wasn't a viable option as LineLeader isn't available as an app within Zapier. Instead, Heath then manually set up the webhook connection using the POST URL and hash key LineLeader provided, and passed data directly to the CRM via JavaScript.

It worked successfully at the time and allowed for both:



  1. Leads to be captured in LineLeader, and



  2. Email notifications to be triggered for centres not connected to LineLeader (Peakhurst Bonds Rd, Peakhurst Belmore Rd, and Sutherland).



Let me know if we need to go back to LineLeader to get the latest POST details or hash keys.

Appreciate your help in getting everything connected again.

Warm regards,
Madeleine Saville
Social Media & Marketing Content Coordinator
Little Scribblers Early Learning Centres

HEAD OFFICE - Centre of Excellence
106 Russell Avenue
Dolls Point NSW 2219

E: Madeleine.saville@littlescribblers.com.au
M: 0475 738 243
Web: www.littlescribblers.com.au

Hi Madeleine,

I hope all is well.

The LineLeader contact form is simply embedded on the website. Unfortunately, we can't make any changes to the fields or dictate which email address will receive the enquiry based on which centre was selected. This will need to be briefed to the LineLeader team and managed by them.

When the form was coded by us on the website (i.e. not using the LineLeader form or system) we were able to offer this location dependant option. Maybe this is what you are remembering.

Let me know how you go with LineLeader. In the meantime, as mentioned, we have reactivated our form here: https://littlescribblers.com.au/enquire/

Hi Madeleine,

The LineLeader contact form is simply embedded on the website. Unfortunately, we can't make any changes to the fields or dictate which email address will receive the enquiry based on which centre was selected. This will need to be briefed to the LineLeader team and managed by them.

When the form was coded by us on the website (i.e. not using the LineLeader form or system) we were able to offer this location dependant option. Maybe this is what you are remembering.

Let me know how you go with LineLeader. In the meantime, as mentioned, we have reactivated our form here: https://littlescribblers.com.au/enquire/
Hi @andy @heath, Can you give me a background regarding the crm setups?

Hi Joel,

Thanks so much for actioning that so quickly!

I'm not entirely sure what the next steps are here, but I do know that previously we were able to have leads for our centres flow through to LineLeader without disrupting the email notifications for Sutherland and both Peakhurst locations, which are self-managed and not connected to the CRM.

Hoping we can get back to a setup that supports both systems. Let me know what you'd recommend from here.

Best regards,
Madeleine

Social Media & Marketing Content Coordinator
Little Scribblers Early Learning Centres

106 Russell Avenue
